channel.title: I can only run my server from localhost... It won't host
channel.description: OK. My server source, Fr33sc4p3, will only run on local host. I have my no-ip DUC running, the correct hostname checked, and a smiley with redcheeks next to it. But no one can get on it. But i can get on through local host. Please help?

item.title: I can only run my server from localhost... It won't host
item.dc:creator: @shadowschool shadowschool
item.description:
@shadowschool wrote:

If anyone tries to log in it says the server is down.

Read full topic
item.source: I can only run my server from localhost... It won't host
